meta.style: Luxury lifestyle photography at golden hour
meta.composition: Medium shot of a woman standing by an infinity pool, looking away towards the ocean sunset.

scene.location: Terrace of a luxury villa overlooking the ocean
environment: Infinity pool with reflections of the sunset
Glass railing along the terrace edge
Palm trees and Mediterranean-style architecture of the villa and surrounding houses
Vast ocean and coastline under a clear sky

lighting.source: Setting sun positioned low on the horizon
lighting.effect: Warm, golden light creating long shadows, highlighting the subject's wet skin and hair, casting a warm glow on the water and architecture.

subject.identity: A woman with wet, platinum blonde hair, looking off to the side.

body.pose: Standing by the glass railing, one hand resting on it, looking out at the view.
body.physique: Slender, toned build with tanned skin

outfit.clothing: Red string bikini with gold ring details on the top and bottom.
outfit.accessories: Multiple gold bangles and a watch on her left wrist.

realism_focus.textures: Wet strands of hair, water droplets on tanned skin, fabric of the bikini, reflective water surface, glass railing, stone terrace tiles
realism_focus.imperfections: Realistic skin texture, water ripples, slight lens flare from the sun
